mintonetteCup.title:
Montpellier hosts the Mintonette Cup, the world volleyball tournament that brings together the best players! 
change the image (wrong colors)

burgerStand.title: Burger Stand
burgerStand.description:
Good news! The burger stand will indeed be present during the Mintonette Cup.
You’ll find a wide selection to satisfy every craving: delicious classic burgers,
more indulgent recipes, and even vegetarian options so everyone can enjoy.

Whether you’re a meat lover or prefer lighter alternatives, everyone will be warmly welcomed. It’s the perfect occasion to share a friendly moment over a good meal while enjoying the event!
